articles.author: Horsetalk.co.nz
articles.title: Benefits of EHV-1 vaccinations at horse boarding facilities highlighted in study - Horsetalk
articles.description: Researchers investigated a total of 589 horses on 13 premises in Europe in search of risk factors for the development of Equid Herpesvirus Myeloencephalopathy.

articles.title: FIFA World Cup: European teams abandon armband campaign - CTV News
articles.description: FIFA's threat of on-field punishment for players pushed World Cup teams to back down Monday and abandon a plan for their captains to wear armbands that were seen as a rebuke to host nation Qatar's human rights record.
articles.content:

articles.author: Charlie Weston
articles.title: Mortgage fixed rates Ireland: Homeowners warned not to panic as huge gap emerges in fixed rates on offer - Independent.ie
articles.description: MORTGAGE holders who want to lock in to a fixed rate to avoid surging European interest rises have been warned not to be panicked into signing up for the wrong rate.
